name: Challenge Coin
description: A heavy coin made of gold.

name: Silver Challenge Coin
description: A decorative coin made of silver.

name: Bronze Challenge Coin
description: A lightweight coin made of bronze.

name: Sir Donovan's Amulet
description: A talisman for remotely contacting your employer

dialogOnUse.text: The amulet lies inert until mana is channeled through it.

options.name: Contact Sir Donovan (Requires 3 Mana Shards)
options.text: Unsure exactly what to expect, you channel a bit of energy from your own mana shards into the amulet. It glows an array of colors for the briefest of moments and then fades.

options.name: (Continue)
options.text: A thought enters your mind in response, not so much words as an urge - you should go to a town.

options.name: Contact Sir Donovan (Requires 5 Mana Shards)
options.text: You funnel the power of your mana shards into the artifact. It takes using a few more of them before the device reacts this time, but eventually it glows in multiple colors once again.

name: Landscape Sketchbook
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of various landscapes across Shandalar

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Seventh Edition
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of classic landscapes

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Limited Edition Alpha
description: A leather bound notebook containing the original basic land artwork from Magic's first set

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Limited Edition Beta
description: A leather bound notebook containing classic basic land artwork from Magic's second printing

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Revised Edition
description: A leather bound notebook containing Third Edition basic lands with white borders

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Fourth Edition
description: A leather bound notebook containing Fourth Edition basic lands

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Fifth Edition
description: A leather bound notebook containing Fifth Edition basic lands

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Sixth Edition
description: A leather bound notebook containing Sixth Edition basic lands

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Ice Age
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of frost covered vistas and snow-covered lands

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Mirage
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of tropical locations

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Tempest
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of stormy, volcanic landscapes

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Urza's Saga
description: A leather bound notebook containing many different angles of the same terrain features

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Mercadian Masques
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of bustling marketplaces and grand architecture

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Odyssey
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of ancient ruins and mystical landscapes

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Onslaught
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of war-torn battlefields

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Portal
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches designed for new planeswalkers

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Portal Second Age
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches from the second portal

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Portal Three Kingdoms
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of ancient Eastern landscapes

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Starter 1999
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches from the 1999 starter collection

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Starter 2000
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches from the millennial starter collection

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Battle Royale
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches from legendary battles

name: Landscape Sketchbook - Beatdown Box Set
description: A leather bound notebook containing sketches of intense combat arenas

name: Jayemdae Tome
description: Draft a Chandra themed card that can be cast with mana of any color.

name: Ring of Renewal
description: Draft a Phoenix card, or conjure one to be cast with mana of any color.

name: Chandra's Stone
description: A small red gemstone recovered after your battle with Chandra.

name: Mogg Fanatic
description: Starts the battle with a Mogg Fanatic.

name: Liliana's Stone
description: A small black gemstone recovered after your battle with Liliana.

name: Bottle of Suleiman
description: Sign away your soul to know what the future holds

name: Boots of the Crossroads
description: Boots that carry the bargain of Haunted Crossroads.

name: Miller's Clothes
description: Well worn garb that comes with a Millstone tucked away.

name: Cadet's Sword
description: Supports the early Soldier plan.

name: Holy Symbol
description: Bolsters Cleric-centric starts.

name: Manasight Amulet
description: Grants Manasight, letting you know the colors used by your adversaries.

name: Ivory Tower
description: Brings life to both friend and foe

name: Colorless rune
description: Teleports you to the center

name: White rune
description: Teleports you to the plains

name: Black rune
description: Teleports you to the swamp

name: Blue rune
description: Teleports you to the island

name: Red rune
description: Teleports you to the mountain

name: Green rune
description: Teleports you to the forest

name: White Staff
description: Heals you half of your life

name: Black Staff
description: Hide from enemies for some time

name: Blue Staff
description: Lets you fly for some time

name: Red Staff
description: Kills the closest enemy on the Overworld

name: Green Staff
description: Doubles your speed for some time

name: Serra's Blessing
description: Turn a creature hexproof until end of turn.

name: Cursed Totem
description: Devour the life of an enemy creature, killing it.
